trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Sault Ste. Marie
There were no other sightings in Sault Ste. Marie on or around September 20th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsWitness was stargazing and noticed a bright white light coming out of NW. Used big dipper as a reference point. Object suddenly shot up at a 90 degree angle. Was out of sight in a few seconds. This information was relayed to me over the phone by the witness. He stated that he did not have Internet access so I took the report. Lisa Behr, Dispatch Operator
